sentences.en: Armiger found differential tolerance to Al among soybean varieties.
sentences.cn: 阿尔米格尔发现大豆各品种对铝有不同的耐性.

sentences.en: But the rain might have come too late to save many farmers' corn and soybean crops.
sentences.cn: 但这场雨可能来得太晚了，无力挽救许多农民的玉米和大豆作物。

sentences.en: Climate change is likely to affect agriculture in southern Brazil, the most important region for crops such as potato, wheat, rice, maize, and soybean.
sentences.cn: 气候变化可能影响到巴西南部的农业，这是种植马铃薯、小麦、稻米、玉米、大豆等作物的最重要地区。

sentences.en: Excessive moisture is unfavourable for soybean germination.
sentences.cn: 水分过多对于大豆萌发是不利的.

sentences.en: In summary, minor element deficiencies do not presently appear to be seriously limiting soybean yields.
sentences.cn: 概括地说, 缺少微量元素不能即刻显现出严重地限制大豆产量.

sentences.en: More land has been diverted to soybean production to meet the increasing demands for the crop.
sentences.cn: 许多农田已改种大豆,以满足对这种作物日益增长的需要.

sentences.en: Nematode damage to the soybean roots is characterized by coarse roots.
sentences.cn: 线虫破坏大豆根系的特征是:根系粗糙.

sentences.en: Removal of flowers and pods from flowering soybean plants also delays leaf aging.
sentences.cn: 如果从大豆开花的植株摘除花和荚,同样也能推迟叶子的衰老.

sentences.en: The cultivated soybean is an erect, bushy annual plant of great morphological diversity.
sentences.cn: 栽培大豆是一种直立 、 丛生、形态变化很大的一年生植物.

sentences.en: The development of the soybean seedling is dependent on the food reserves stored in the cotyledons.
sentences.cn: 大豆幼苗的发育依靠子叶中所贮存的养分.

sentences.en: The first carbohydrates produced in soybean photosynthesis are trioses, 3 - phosphoglyceric acid and glycerate.
sentences.cn: 大豆光合作用所产生的最初碳水化合物是丙醣, 三磷酸甘油酸和甘油酸盐.

sentences.en: The incentives for expansion of soybean production are great.
sentences.cn: 这对提高大豆生产是很大的鼓励.

sentences.en: The last houses give way to soybean fields.
sentences.cn: 最后一批房子也被拆掉用作了大豆地。

sentences.en: The light saturation curve of soybean photosynthesis has been determined by a number of workers.
sentences.cn: 许多研究者曾测得了大豆光合作用的光饱和曲线.

sentences.en: The root system of the soybean consists of a taproot formed by the radicle.
sentences.cn: 大豆的根系包括由胚根形成的主根.

sentences.en: They raised the baby on soybean milk.
sentences.cn: 他们用豆浆把这个孩子喂养大了.

sentences.en: Through baking and shelf life experiments, the application of soybean protein to the cake was studied.
sentences.cn: 通过焙烤和货架期实验，就大豆蛋白在蛋糕中的应用进行了研究。

sentences.en: Wine growers say they've been held hostage to the interests of the cereal and soybean farmers.
sentences.cn: 葡萄种植兼酿酒者说他们一直都为谷物和大豆种植者的利益所绑架。

phrases.tran_cn: 大豆卵磷脂（从大豆中提取的精华物质）
